page.title: 19TEESDALE FIELD COURSE
page.content: Children from St Johns Chapel, Rookhope and Frosterley schools went on a field course to Middleton. All together there were 26 children and one teacher from each school. We stayed from Monday 10th June to Friday 14th June at Middleton Field Study Center which was originally a school. After breakfast we walked to places such as Gibson's Cave, High Force and Grassholme Reservoir .We had a packed lunch and came back for tea.We were then allowed a short time for recreation before we had to copy up the day's work in our diary. There were three dormitories. For recreation we played rounders, football and cricket. The teacher kicked the ball in to the River Tees and we lost it. Next year the schools will go to Beamish Hall for their field course.
